Draft:Pierre-Benoist Varoclier https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Pierre-Benoist_Varoclier 0 Pierre-Benoist Varoclier (born on April, 30 1983 in Fontainebleau, France) is a French actor and theatre director. He first he studied economics and philosophy in business school, at Harvard University and Bristol University. Later, he also trained as an actor at London Academy of Music and Dramatic Art (LAMDA, Class of 2008) and at Conservatoire National Supérieur d'Art Dramatique (CNSAD, Class of 20009) in Paris. He was elected Talent Cannes in 2012 at Cannes Film Festival. Pierre-Benoist_Varoclier ( born on April , 30_1983 in Fontainebleau , France ) is a_French_actor_and_theatre_director . He first he studied economics and philosophy in business_school , at Harvard_University and Bristol_University . Later , he also trained as an_actor at London_Academy of Music and Dramatic_Art_(_LAMDA , Class of 2008_) and at Conservatoire_National_Supérieur_d'Art_Dramatique_(_CNSAD , Class of 20009_) in Paris . He was_elected Talent_Cannes in 2012 at Cannes_Film_Festival .
